metadata.title: CVE-2015-5168 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Unspecified vulnerability in the HTTP/2 experimental feature in Apache Traffic Server 5.3.x before 5.3.2 has unknown impact and attack vectors, a different vulnerability than CVE-2015-5206.

criterions.comment: trafficserver package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.0.0-5').
